title: Create v0.x maintenance branch
description:
Create a branch for Nuxt 3 maintenance releases before upgrading main to Nuxt 4.

Steps:
1. Create branch 'v0.x' from main
2. Update branch protection rules (if any)
3. Document branch strategy in README

This preserves Nuxt 3 compatibility for consumers who can't upgrade yet.
acceptance_criteria: v0.x branch created and pushed to origin
closed_reason: Created v0.x branch from main and pushed to origin
